home.title: Strapi portfolio starter
home.bio: This is a sample portfolio website. All this site's data is managed in a [Strapi project](https://strapi.io). The frontend was built with [Gridsome](https://gridsome.org), a Vue.js framework to build static sites. You can use this starter and customize it to build your own portfolio. You can also check out our other [Strapi starters](https://github.com/strapi?q=starter).

seo.title: Strapi Gridsome portfolio demo
seo.description: A sample application made with Strapi and Gridsome.

content.content:
# About me

This is a section where you get to talk about yourself. Show off your personality, interests, or childhood pictures.

For example, here are my hobbies:

* Scuba diving
* Hiking
* Karaoke nights

Again, you can add as much content as you want here. People want to get to know you!

You can also write *italic* or **bold** text.

> Wow this about section looks great
>
> -- A happy Strapi user

seo.title: About me
seo.description: Me, my life, my hobbies, and a summary of what I do outside of work.
